synopsis.text:
These synopses tell the tale of an ancient intergalactic conflict between two tribes, the Plazmans and the Sazorions, which took place 20,000 years before the emergence of humanity. The aggressive Sazorions sought to conquer the peaceful Plazmans by harnessing the formidable power of the Scorpio constellation. In response, the Plazmans created the Three Spheres of the Other to counter the Sazorions' offensive capabilities.

Fast forward to the future, Dr. Godo, the last surviving member of the Plazmans, anticipates the resurgence of the Sazorions. To safeguard Earth and preserve peace, he clandestinely develops Ginguiser, a magical robot unit. To pilot this powerful invention, Dr. Godo enlists the help of four courageous young men, each possessing unique occult abilities. Previously known for their small-scale performances around the globe, these individuals now find themselves at the forefront of a battle to protect their planet.

Each episode of this series promises thrilling and imaginative battles that will captivate audiences and keep them on the edge of their seats.
